zh: 南斯拉夫表示，它不对波斯尼亚塞族民兵的行为负责，这些行为在过去三个月中造成数千人死亡，城市被毁，130万人沦为难民。

zh: 杨太太不介意我突然拜访她。

en: Mr Young has no less than six cars.

en: He was compelled to sign the contract.

zh: 暴风雨不但没有停止，反而变得更加猛烈。

en: The upper part of the mountain is covered with snow.

en: Let well enough alone.

en: He stabbed me in the back!

en: You managed it after all.

en: You get rusty if you haven't spoken English for a long time.

en: You're just the kind of person I imagined you'd be.

en: I got a driver's license at last.

en: I have finally regained my regular form.

en: The weather has settled at last.

en: Well, here we are at last!

en: At last, I graduated from junior high school.

en: Finally, we found a point of compromise.

en: It has finally stopped snowing and has warmed up.

en: At last, the truth became known to us.

en: At last, my turn came.

en: I finally got a job.

en: At last, we made contact with the police.

en: After all that, the pain went away.

en: At last, we were home!

en: At last, the end-of-term exams are over.

en: Pick a job that you enjoy and working will seem easy.

en: Finally, I finished a painting.

en: The rain stopped at last.

en: The meaning dawned upon me at last.

en: I'm glad I've finally caught you.

en: What is good to do cannot be done too soon.

en: Do to others as you would be done by.

en: You'll succeed if you try.

en: The problem was how to drive quickly and safely to the house.

en: Of course our lifestyle is different from America.
zh: 当然，我们的生活方式和美国不同。

en: I took it for granted that you would join.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你会加入。

en: Air as well as sunlight is, needless to say, indispensable to our daily life.
zh: 不用说，空气和阳光对我们的日常生活都是不可或缺的。

en: Oh, sure, I studied English in my school days. But it wasn't until two or three years ago that I really started taking it seriously.
zh: 哦，当然，我上学的时候学过英语。但直到两三年前，我才真正开始认真对待它。

en: Of course, we must do our best.
zh: 当然，我们必须尽力而为。

en: It goes without saying that country life is healthier than town life.
zh: 不用说，乡村生活比城市生活更健康。

en: Sure, go right ahead.
zh: 当然，请便。

en: Definitely!
zh: 当然！

en: Of course I remember the news quite well.
zh: 我当然很清楚地记得这个新闻。

en: Of course, you may.
zh: 当然，你可以。

en: Why not?
zh: 为什么不呢？

en: Of course they resemble each other in some ways.
zh: 当然，他们在某些方面是相似的。

en: As a matter of course, she passed the examination.
zh: 她理所当然地通过了考试。

en: Of course I can drive a car very well.
zh: 我当然很会开车。

en: I am against the war, of course.
zh: 我当然是反对战争的。

en: Of course, I'm young, and politics is conducted by grown-ups.
zh: 当然，我还年轻，政治是由成年人主导的。

en: Of course, I will go there with you.
zh: 我当然会和你一起去那里。

en: I am, of course.
zh: 当然，我是。

en: Of course, to be valuable, an old carpet must be in good condition.
zh: 当然，要具有价值，旧地毯必须状况良好。

en: Why not? I'd be happy to.
zh: 为什么不呢？我很乐意。

en: Of course Darwin, like many of his contemporaries, wished to be seen as following the Newtonian method.
zh: 当然，达尔文和他的许多同代人一样，希望被认为是在遵循牛顿的方法。

en: By all means. Go ahead.
zh: 当然可以，请便。

en: I will help you, of course.
zh: 我当然会帮助你。

en: Every man for his own trade.
zh: 各行各业，各有所长。

en: Modern jazz is not to my taste.
zh: 现代爵士乐不合我的口味。

en: Modern jazz is not my line.
zh: 现代爵士乐不是我的菜。

en: The day is breaking soon.
zh: 天快亮了。

en: Once I learned what to listen for, I came to appreciate modern jazz.
zh: 一旦我学会了听什么，我就开始欣赏现代爵士乐了。

en: It's best to wear a cap on your head during the cold Moscow winters.
zh: 在寒冷的莫斯科冬天，最好戴一顶帽子。

en: You've got another four day's journey before you reach Moscow.
zh: 到达莫斯科之前，你还有四天的路程。

en: If your essay is on the short side, you can always pad it out with a few quotations.
zh: 如果你的文章篇幅不够，你可以用一些引言来充实它。

en: If anyone comes in my absence, tell him that I won't come back till evening.
zh: 如果有人在我不在的时候来，告诉他我晚上才会回来。

en: If it had not been for the storm, we would have been in time for the meeting.
zh: 如果不是因为这场暴风雨，我们就能及时赶到会议了。

en: If you can, come with us.
zh: 如果可以，和我们一起去吧。

en: Come if possible.
zh: 如果可能的话，来吧。

en: If you care to, come with us.
zh: 如果你愿意，和我们一起去吧。

en: If we had wings, could we fly to the moon?
zh: 如果我们有翅膀，我们能飞到月球吗？

en: You'll never get ahead in this place unless you go through the proper channels.
zh: 如果你不按正规渠道办事，你永远无法在这里出人头地。

en: Provided you have a reservation, you can check in anytime.
zh: 只要你有预订，你随时都可以办理入住。

en: If you have a certificate of immunization, please bring it when you come.
zh: 如果你有免疫证明，请来的时候带上。

en: What would you do if you saw a ghost?
zh: 如果你看到鬼，你会怎么做？

en: If you can't keep your promise, what excuse will you make?
zh: 如果你不能信守承诺，你会有什么借口？

en: If you have any interesting books, lend me some.
zh: 如果你有什么有趣的书，借我一些。

en: I will go out if it is fine tomorrow.
zh: 如果明天天气好，我就出去。

en: If it is sunny tomorrow, we will go on a picnic.
zh: 如果明天是晴天，我们就去野餐。

en: If it snows much tomorrow, let's make a snowman.
zh: 如果明天下很大的雪，我们来堆雪人吧。

en: If it is fine tomorrow, we will play baseball.
zh: 如果明天天气好，我们就去打棒球。

en: If it's a nice day tomorrow, we'll go on a picnic.
zh: 如果明天天气好，我们就去野餐。

en: If it rains tomorrow, I'll stay at home.
zh: 如果明天下雨，我就待在家里。

en: The game will be called off if it rains tomorrow.
zh: 如果明天下雨，比赛就会取消。

en: If it rains tomorrow, I'm not going to the meeting.
zh: 如果明天下雨，我就不去开会了。

en: If it rains tomorrow, the baseball game will be put off.
zh: 如果明天下雨，棒球比赛就会延期。

en: If it is rainy tomorrow, the game will be put off.
zh: 如果明天下雨，比赛就会延期。

en: If it rains tomorrow, I won't go on a picnic.
zh: 如果明天下雨，我就不去野餐了。

en: If it should rain tomorrow, we would go by bus.
zh: 万一下雨，我们就坐公交车去。

en: If it rains tomorrow, will you stay at home?
zh: 如果明天下雨，你会待在家里吗？

en: If it rains tomorrow, we will go there by car.
zh: 如果明天下雨，我们就开车去那里。

en: If it rains tomorrow, let's stay home.
zh: 如果明天下雨，我们待在家里吧。

en: Otherwise we will have to cancel this order.
zh: 否则，我们不得不取消这个订单。

en: If you want to make your dreams come true, keep on trying.
zh: 如果你想实现你的梦想，就坚持尝试。

en: In case you sleep, set the alarm.
zh: 如果你要睡觉，就设个闹钟。

en: If it should rain tomorrow, the excursion will be canceled.
zh: 万一下雨，郊游就会取消。

en: If he would help you, he might come to you at once.
zh: 如果他愿意帮助你，他可能会立刻来找你。

en: What if he should happen to come late?
zh: 万一他碰巧来晚了怎么办？

en: What if he should happen to be late?
zh: 万一他碰巧迟到了怎么办？

en: What if he should fail?
zh: 万一他失败了怎么办？

en: If you should need any help, just let me know.
zh: 如果你需要任何帮助，请告诉我。

en: If I should fail again, I would give up the plan.
zh: 如果我再次失败，我就放弃这个计划。

en: If I happen to end up going abroad, I'd probably go for France.
zh: 如果我碰巧最终要出国，我可能会去法国。

en: If anything should happen, please let me know.
zh: 万一发生什么事，请告诉我。

en: If it should rain, he will not come.
zh: 万一下雨，他就不来了。

en: If John should call me, tell him I'll be back at seven.
zh: 如果约翰打电话给我，告诉他我七点回来。

en: What would you do if the world were to come to an end tomorrow?
zh: 如果明天是世界末日，你会做什么？

en: If she should come to Japan, Jane would be very happy.
zh: 如果她来日本，简会非常高兴。

en: If I should fail, what would my parents say?
zh: 如果我失败了，我的父母会说什么？

en: If you're sure you're not in a hurry, I can use a little help.
zh: 如果你确定你不着急，我可以请你帮个忙。

en: If it were not for books, life would be boring.
zh: 如果没有书，生活会很无聊。

en: If my brother were here, he would know what to do.
zh: 如果我哥哥在这里，他会知道该怎么做。

en: Were I you, I would ignore it.
zh: 如果我是你，我会忽略它。

en: Were I you, I would follow his advice.
zh: 如果我是你，我会听从他的建议。

en: If I were you, I wouldn't do it.
zh: 如果我是你，我就不会这样做。

en: If you are busy, I will help you.
zh: 如果你很忙，我会帮助你。

en: If you come upon a new word in a sentence, what will you do with it?
zh: 如果你在句子中遇到一个新单词，你会怎么做？

en: Even if you lose the game, you'll have another chance.
zh: 即使你输了比赛，你还会有另一次机会。

en: If it had not been for his father's help, he would have failed in business.
zh: 如果不是他父亲的帮助，他的生意就会失败。

en: If you have any complaints, let me know, and I'll look into them.
zh: 如果你有任何不满，请告诉我，我会调查一下。

en: If a sick person folds one thousand paper cranes, her wish will come true.
zh: 如果一个病人折一千只纸鹤，她的愿望就会实现。

en: If I were not ill, I would join you.
zh: 如果我没有生病，我会加入你们。

en: What would you do if you had a million dollars?
zh: 如果你有一百万美元，你会做什么？

en: Let me help you, if necessary.
zh: 如果需要，让我来帮助你。

en: If necessary, I'll come at nine tomorrow.
zh: 如果需要，我明天九点来。

en: I'll go and meet him, if it's necessary.
zh: 如果需要，我会去见他。

en: If you are tired, go to bed.
zh: 如果你累了，就去睡觉吧。

en: If he hadn't been tired, he would've gone.
zh: 如果他当时没有累，他就会去了。

en: If her temperature goes up, send for the doctor.
zh: 如果她的体温升高，就请医生。

en: If I knew her name and address, I could write to her.
zh: 如果我知道她的名字和地址，我就可以给她写信了。

en: If I knew her address, I would write to her.
zh: 如果我知道她的地址，我就会给她写信。

en: If I had known her address, I could have visited her.
zh: 如果我早知道她的地址，我就可以去看她了。

en: If I had noticed her, I would have got her autograph.
zh: 如果我注意到她，我就会要到她的签名。

en: If she hadn't made waves about it, she never would have got her money back.
zh: 如果她没有大肆宣扬这件事，她永远也拿不回她的钱。

en: If she'd set off now, she would make it on time.
zh: 如果她现在出发，她就能准时到达。

en: There is no telling what would happen if she doesn't show up.
zh: 如果她不出现，真不知道会发生什么。

en: With a little more patience, she would have succeeded.
zh: 如果她再多一点耐心，她就会成功了。

en: If she visits France again, she will have been there three times.
zh: 如果她再次访问法国，她就去过那里三次了。

en: If she were here now, I would tell her the truth.
zh: 如果她现在在这里，我会告诉她真相。

en: If she had trusted you, she wouldn't have done so.
zh: 如果她信任你，她就不会那样做了。

en: If you call him a clever man, he may be happy.
zh: 如果你说他是个聪明人，他可能会很高兴。

en: To look at him, you would take him to be a foreigner.
zh: 看他的样子，你会认为他是外国人。

en: If they hadn't found the vase, John would have been accused of stealing it.
zh: 如果他们没有找到那个花瓶，约翰就会被指控偷窃。

en: If it were not for his help, I might fail.
zh: 如果不是他的帮助，我可能会失败。

en: If it had not been for his help, I would have failed.
zh: 如果不是他的帮助，我就会失败。

en: If it had not been for his advice, I might have failed.
zh: 如果不是他的建议，我可能已经失败了。

en: If it hadn't been for his help, she might have drowned.
zh: 如果不是他的帮助，她可能已经淹死了。

en: If I knew his address, I would write to him.
zh: 如果我知道他的地址，我会给他写信。

en: If I knew his address, I would get in touch with him right away.
zh: 如果我知道他的地址，我会立刻联系他。

en: If I had known his address, I would have written.
zh: 如果我早知道他的地址，我早就写信了。

en: As I didn't know his address, I couldn't write to him.
zh: 因为我不知道他的地址，所以我没法给他写信。

en: If I knew his address, I could write to him.
zh: 如果我知道他的地址，我就可以给他写信了。

en: With his support, she might have been elected mayor.
zh: 有了他的支持，她可能已经被选为市长了。

en: If it had not been for his help, we would have failed in our enterprise.
zh: 如果不是他的帮助，我们的事业就会失败。

en: If it were not for his assistance, we could not carry out the project.
zh: 要不是他的帮助，我们无法完成这个项目。

en: If it had not been for his help, we would have failed in business.
zh: 要不是他的帮助，我们的生意就会失败。

en: The firm might have lost all its money if it had taken his advice.
zh: 如果公司听了他的建议，可能早就赔光了所有的钱。

en: She wouldn't have married him if she had known him better.
zh: 如果她更了解他，就不会嫁给他了。

en: If he had enough time, he might have done good work.
zh: 如果他有足够的时间，他可能会做出一番成就。

en: If you happen to see him, please give him my best regards.
zh: 如果你碰巧见到他，请代我向他问好。

en: If you do that to him, he will cut your throat.
zh: 如果你那样对他，他会割你的喉咙。

en: We will help him if he asks us.
zh: 如果他请求我们，我们会帮助他。

en: You'll have to take his place in case he can't come.
zh: 万一他来不了，你得代替他。

en: If he comes, tell him to wait for me.
zh: 如果他来了，告诉他等我。

en: If he came tomorrow, I would have more time to talk.
zh: 如果他明天来，我就有更多时间谈话了。

en: If he had told me the truth, I would have forgiven him.
zh: 如果他告诉我真相，我会原谅他的。

en: She would have fallen into the pond if he had not caught her by the arm.
zh: 如果他没有抓住她的胳膊，她就会掉进池塘里了。

en: If he knew her phone number, he could call her.
zh: 如果他知道她的电话号码，他就可以给她打电话了。

en: If he had known her phone number, he could have called her up.
zh: 如果他知道她的电话号码，他就可以给她打过电话了。

en: If he had heard her advice, he would have succeeded.
zh: 如果他听了她的建议，他就会成功了。

en: If it hadn't been for his advice, I couldn't have succeeded.
zh: 要不是他的建议，我不可能成功。

en: If he should arrive late, you may start the conference without him.
zh: 万一他迟到，你们可以不等他开始会议。

en: If he had been honest, I would have employed him.
zh: 如果他诚实，我就会雇用他。

en: If he sends me any letters, I just tear them up and throw them away.
zh: 如果他寄给我任何信件，我就撕掉扔掉。

en: If he had not picked me up, I would not be here now.
zh: 如果他没有来接我，我现在就不会在这里了。

en: I'll be deeply affected by his death.
zh: 他的去世会深深地影响我。

en: He ought to be punished if he commits a crime.
zh: 如果他犯罪，就应该受到惩罚。

en: If he doesn't get a letter from me once a month, he will reveal the Pope's secret to the world.
zh: 如果他一个月收不到我的信，他就会向全世界泄露教皇的秘密。

en: Born in a rich family, he would have studied in England.
zh: 如果出生在一个富裕的家庭，他本可以去英国留学。

en: If he is absent, we will not have an English test.
zh: 如果他缺席，我们就不会有英语考试。

en: If he will not work hard, he will be fired.
zh: 如果他不努力工作，他就会被解雇。

en: If you hear anything new from him, please let me know about it.
zh: 如果你听到他的任何新消息，请告诉我。

en: If he had worked harder, he might be a rich man now.
zh: 如果他当时更努力工作，他现在可能已经是个富人了。

en: If he will come, I will wait for him till he comes.
zh: 如果他要来，我会等他直到他来。

en: If he had stayed at home that day, he would not have met with disaster.
zh: 如果那天他待在家里，他就不会遭遇不幸。

en: Had he known the facts, the accident might have been avoided.
zh: 如果他知道真相，事故可能就可以避免了。

en: Had he known the truth, he would have told me.
zh: 如果他知道真相，他就会告诉我。

en: He would still be alive had he refused to go to the battlefield then.
zh: 如果他当时拒绝去战场，他现在还活着。

en: He would not say so if he didn't know about that.
zh: 如果他不知道这件事，他不会这么说的。

en: If he were here, what would he say?
zh: 如果他在这里，他会说什么？

en: If he comes, so much the better.
zh: 如果他来，那就更好了。

en: If he comes, show him into my room.
zh: 如果他来，请带他到我的房间。

en: If he had been careful then, the terrible accident would not have happened.
zh: 如果他当时小心一点，就不会发生那场可怕的事故了。

en: If he carries on drinking like that, he's going to have a problem.
zh: 如果他继续这样喝酒，他会出问题的。

en: If he had left at ten, he would have arrived here by now.
zh: 如果他十点离开，他现在应该已经到这里了。

en: If I had had enough money, I would have bought the book.
zh: 如果我有足够的钱，我就会买那本书。

en: If you are ever in Japan, come and see me.
zh: 如果你有机会来日本，来找我。

en: You may take the book if you can read it.
zh: 如果你能读懂它，你可以拿走这本书。

en: I'll come at three o'clock if it is convenient to you.
zh: 如果对你方便，我三点来。

en: If it's convenient come here tonight.
zh: 如果方便的话，今晚来这里。

en: If the telephone rings, can you answer it?
zh: 如果电话响了，你能接一下吗？

en: Without telephones, it would be inconvenient.
zh: 如果没有电话，那会很不方便。

en: I'm not here if anybody calls.
zh: 如果有人打电话来，我不在。

en: If anybody calls, get his number.
zh: 如果有人打电话来，记下他的号码。

en: If it were not for electricity, our civilized life would be impossible.
zh: 如果没有电，我们的文明生活是不可能的。

en: The gathering will be large if the weather is good.
zh: 如果天气好，聚会规模会很大。

en: I mean to go tomorrow if the weather is fine.
zh: 如果天气好的话，我打算明天去。

en: Weather permitting, let's go on a picnic.
zh: 如果天气允许，我们去野餐吧。

en: He says that if he were a bird he would fly to me.
zh: 他说如果他是一只鸟，他会飞到我身边。

en: If you ever come to town, come to see me.
zh: 如果你来城里，一定要来看我。

en: If it had not been for the map, I would have lost my way.
zh: 如果不是因为那张地图，我就会迷路了。

en: What would become of our city if an earthquake were to hit it?
zh: 如果发生地震，我们的城市会变成什么样？

en: If anyone comes to see me, tell him that I am out.
zh: 如果有人来看我，告诉他我出去了。

en: If anybody comes, tell him that I am out.
zh: 如果有人来，告诉他我出去了。

en: If you want to go to college, study English harder.
zh: 如果你想上大学，就更努力地学习英语。

en: If they admit me to the university, I think I will major in economics.
zh: 如果他们录取我到大学，我想我会主修经济学。

en: But that he was idle, he would have succeeded.
zh: 要不是他懒惰，他早就成功了。

en: I will come provided I feel well enough.
zh: 如果我感觉好些，我就来。

en: I will come provided I am well enough.
zh: 如果我身体好的话，我会来的。

en: If the sun were to rise in the west, I would never give up the plan.
zh: 即使太阳从西边升起，我也绝不会放弃这个计划。

en: If the sun were to go out, all living things would die.
zh: 如果太阳熄灭了，所有的生物都会死亡。

en: If the sun were to stop shining, all living things would die.
zh: 如果太阳停止发光，所有的生物都会死亡。

en: If it were not for the sun, there would be no life on the earth.
zh: 如果没有太阳，地球上就不会有生命。

en: If it were not for the sun, we could not live.
zh: 如果没有太阳，我们就无法生存。

en: If it were not for the sun, every living thing would die.
zh: 如果没有太阳，所有的生物都会死亡。

en: If it were not for the sun, no living creatures could exist on the earth.
zh: 如果没有太阳，地球上就不会有任何生物存在。

en: If it were not for the sun, we could not live at all.
zh: 如果没有太阳，我们就根本无法生存。

en: Other things being equal, the simplest explanation is the best.
zh: 在其他条件相同的情况下，最简单的解释是最好的。

en: Supposing war broke out, what would you do?
zh: 假设战争爆发了，你会怎么做？

en: If a player hit the tree with the ball, it meant that the crops would grow successfully.
zh: 如果球员用球击中树，就意味着庄稼会丰收。

en: What will become of us if a war breaks out?
zh: 如果爆发战争，我们将会怎么样？

en: If I could be reborn, I would want to be the child of a rich family, then I'd be set for life.
zh: 如果可以重生，我想成为一个富裕家庭的孩子，那样我就一生无忧了。

en: If you are to be successful, you are to do your best.
zh: 如果你想要成功，你就要尽你最大的努力。

en: If you are to succeed, you must work hard.
zh: 如果你要成功，你必须努力工作。

en: If our neighbors around the world are in need, let's lend a helping hand.
zh: 如果世界各地的邻居需要帮助，让我们伸出援手。

en: If it were not for water, human life would be impossible.
zh: 如果没有水，人类的生命是不可能的。

en: If it were not for water, nothing could live.
zh: 如果没有水，任何生物都无法生存。

en: If it were not for water, no creature could live.
zh: 如果没有水，任何生物都无法生存。

en: If it were not for water, no one could live on earth.
zh: 如果没有水，任何人都无法在地球上生存。

en: If it were not for water, humans could not survive.
zh: 如果没有水，人类就无法生存。

en: If it were not for water, we could not live.
zh: 如果没有水，我们就无法生存。

en: If it were not for water, there would be no life on the earth.
zh: 如果没有水，地球上就不会有生命。

en: If you have a medical certificate, bring it.
zh: 如果你有医疗证明，请带上它。

en: He is nothing, if not kind.
zh: 他即使不是最善良的，也是非常善良的。

en: You'd better not swim if you've just eaten.
zh: 如果你刚吃完饭，最好不要游泳。

en: If it were not for plants, we wouldn't be able to live.
zh: 如果没有植物，我们就无法生存。

en: If wisely used, money can do much.
zh: 如果使用得当，金钱可以发挥很大的作用。

en: If you are to win, you should do your best.
zh: 如果你想赢，你应该尽你最大的努力。

en: But for my advice, you would have failed.
zh: 要不是我的建议，你早就失败了。

en: What do you think would happen if it were not for books?
zh: 如果没有书，你认为会发生什么？

en: If I had enough money, I would buy that nice car.
zh: 如果我有足够的钱，我会买那辆漂亮的汽车。

en: If I had enough money, I could go abroad.
zh: 如果我有足够的钱，我就可以出国了。

en: If I had 25% more income, I'd be more satisfied with my life.
zh: 如果我的收入能增加25%，我会对我的生活更满意。

en: Suppose you are fired, what will you do first?
zh: 假设你被解雇了，你首先会做什么？

en: If you have any difficulty, ask me for help.
zh: 如果你有任何困难，就来找我帮忙。

en: If the car is gone, he can't be at the office.
zh: 如果车不见了，他就不可能在办公室。

en: If the number of cars increases, so will the traffic.
zh: 如果汽车数量增加，交通也会增加。

en: If the car breaks down, we'll walk.
zh: 如果车坏了，我们就走路。

en: If they don't have a car, they'll come by taxi.
zh: 如果他们没有车，他们会打车来。

en: If time permits, I'll visit the museum.
zh: 如果时间允许，我会参观博物馆。

en: I will come, time permitting.
zh: 如果时间允许，我会来的。

en: If you have time, please drop in on us.
zh: 如果你有时间，请来我们这里坐坐。

en: If he had failed the exam, what would he have done?
zh: 如果他考试不及格，他会怎么办？

en: If the accident happens, report to me.
zh: 如果发生事故，向我报告。

en: If it were not for examinations, how happy our school life would be!
zh: 如果没有考试，我们的学校生活会多么快乐啊！

en: Suppose that we miss the last train, what should we do?
zh: 假设我们错过了最后一班火车，我们该怎么办？

en: If a burglar came into my room, I would throw something at him.
zh: 如果一个小偷进入我的房间，我会向他扔东西。

en: If anything should ever happen to me, you can look here.
zh: 如果我万一发生什么事，你可以在这里找。

en: If you had taken my advice, you wouldn't be in such trouble.
zh: 如果你听了我的劝告，你就不会有这样的麻烦了。

en: If not for my advice, you would have failed.
zh: 要不是我的建议，你早就失败了。

en: If my house were a mansion, I would invite everyone I know to my birthday party.
zh: 如果我的房子是豪宅，我会邀请我认识的每个人参加我的生日派对。

en: If I had wings, I would fly to you.
zh: 如果我有翅膀，我会飞向你。

en: If I had enough time, I would talk with you.
zh: 如果我有足够的时间，我会和你谈谈。

en: If I had wings to fly, I would have gone to save her.
zh: 如果我有翅膀可以飞，我早就去救她了。

en: But for my family, I would not work so hard.
zh: 要不是为了我的家人，我就不会这么努力工作。

en: But for my family, I would not have worked so hard.
zh: 要不是为了我的家人，我就不会那么努力工作。

en: If I had had enough money, I could have bought it.
zh: 如果我当时有足够的钱，我就能买下它了。

en: If we all pull together we should be able to get the country out of the mess it's in.
zh: 如果我们齐心协力，我们应该能够把国家从困境中解救出来。

en: If we want a peaceful life, we cannot help objecting to war.
zh: 如果我们想要和平的生活，我们就不能不反对战争。

en: It would be unfair if we treated him so badly.
zh: 如果我们那样对他，那就太不公平了。

en: It would be splendid if we could go there, wouldn't it?
zh: 如果我们能去那里，那就太棒了，不是吗？

en: If I don't come back, the venture will probably be unsuccessful.
zh: 如果我回不来，这项事业可能就不会成功了。

en: If I had known his address, I would have written to him.
zh: 如果我知道他的地址，我就会给他写信了。

en: Were I a bird, I would fly to you.
zh: 如果我是一只鸟，我会飞向你。

en: If I were a bird, I could fly to you.
zh: 如果我是一只鸟，我就能飞向你。

en: In case I am late, you don't have to wait for me.
zh: 如果我迟到了，你不必等我。

en: If I were a boy, I could join a baseball team.
zh: 如果我是个男孩，我就可以加入棒球队了。

en: If I had worked hard in my youth, I would be successful now.
zh: 如果我年轻时努力工作，我现在就会成功了。

en: If I knew the truth, I would tell you.
zh: 如果我知道真相，我会告诉你的。

en: If I were to die, what would my family do?
zh: 如果我死了，我的家人会怎么办？

en: If I were in your place, I would lend him a hand.
zh: 如果我处在你的位置，我会帮他一把。

en: Were I in your position, I would oppose that plan.
zh: 如果我处在你的位置，我会反对那个计划。

en: If I were in your place, I would not do so.
zh: 如果我处在你的位置，我就不会那样做。

en: Had I realized what you intended, I wouldn't have agreed.
zh: 如果我意识到你的意图，我就不会同意了。

en: If I was you, I wouldn't do such a thing.
zh: 如果我是你，我就不会做那样的事。

en: If I were you, I should not do such a thing.
zh: 如果我是你，我就不应该做那样的事。

en: If I had been with you, I could have helped you.
zh: 如果我和你在一起，我就能帮助你了。

en: If I were you, I would go home at once.
zh: 如果我是你，我会立刻回家。

en: If I were rich, I would study abroad, but as it is I can't do so.
zh: 如果我有钱，我就会出国留学，但实际上我做不到。

en: If I were rich, I would buy a fine house.
zh: 如果我有钱，我会买一栋漂亮的房子。

en: If I were free, I could help you.
zh: 如果我自由，我就能帮助你。

en: If I knew it, I would tell it to you.
zh: 如果我知道这件事，我会告诉你的。

en: If I were free, I would accept his invitation.
zh: 如果我自由，我会接受他的邀请。

en: If I had known it, I would have told it to you.
zh: 如果我早知道这件事，我早就告诉你了。

en: If I had known about it, I would have changed my plan.
zh: 如果我早知道这件事，我就会改变我的计划。

en: Had I known about it, I would have told you.
zh: 如果我早知道这件事，我就会告诉你。

en: If I had been rich, I would have given you some money.
zh: 如果我当时很富有，我就会给你一些钱。

en: If I had enough money, I could buy it.
zh: 如果我有足够的钱，我就能买它。

en: If I had bought the painting then, I would be rich now.
zh: 如果我当时买了那幅画，我现在就富有了。

en: Were I in your place I would do the same thing.
zh: 如果我处在你的位置，我也会做同样的事情。

en: If I were you, I would trust her.
zh: 如果我是你，我会信任她。

en: Were I in your position, I would do it at once.
zh: 如果我处在你的位置，我会立刻去做。

en: If I were you, I would quit my job and leave London.
zh: 如果我是你，我会辞掉工作，离开伦敦。

en: If I were you, I would accept his offer.
zh: 如果我是你，我会接受他的提议。

en: If I were you, I would have done the same thing in such a difficult situation.
zh: 如果我是你，在那样困难的情况下，我也会做同样的事情。

en: If I were you, I would apply for the scholarship.
zh: 如果我是你，我会申请奖学金。

en: I would be more careful if I were you.
zh: 如果我是你，我会更小心。

en: If I were you, I wouldn't do a thing like that.
zh: 如果我是你，我不会做那样的事情。

en: I wouldn't do that if I were you.
zh: 如果我是你，我不会那样做。

en: I wouldn't do it if I were you.
zh: 如果我是你，我不会做这件事。

en: If your child drinks poison, rush him to the hospital.
zh: 如果你的孩子喝了毒药，赶紧把他送到医院。

en: Were I free from work, I could read these books.
zh: 如果我没有工作，我就可以读这些书了。

en: Without oxygen, all animals would have disappeared long ago.
zh: 如果没有氧气，所有动物早就消失了。

en: If our last batter had not finally hit a home run, our team would have lost the game.
zh: 如果我们最后一个击球手没有最终击出本垒打，我们的球队就会输掉比赛。

en: Refer to the Users' Guide if you have any problems.
zh: 如果您有任何问题，请参考用户指南。

en: If she were here now, I could tell her the truth.
zh: 如果她现在在这里，我就能告诉她真相。

en: If his father wasn't there, he'd be poor right now.
zh: 如果他父亲不在那里，他现在就很穷了。

en: If it were Sunday today, we would go fishing.
zh: 如果今天星期天，我们就会去钓鱼。

en: If today was Sunday, I would go fishing.
zh: 如果今天星期天，我就去钓鱼。

en: Your tea will get cold if you don't drink it now.
zh: 如果你现在不喝，你的茶就要凉了。

en: If I had one million yen now, I would buy a car.
zh: 如果我现在有一百万日元，我就买一辆车。

en: If a high hill stood between A and B, it was important to decide whether the line should climb over it, pierce it with a tunnel, or make a detour to avoid it.
zh: 如果A和B之间有一座高山，重要的是要决定线路是应该翻越它，用隧道穿过它，还是绕道避开它。

en: You can go if you want to.
zh: 如果你想去，你可以去。

en: If the plant is completed next year, a new production manager will have to be hired.
zh: 如果工厂明年建成，就必须雇用一位新的生产经理。

en: If you have no liking for modern music, you will not enjoy this concert.
zh: 如果你不喜欢现代音乐，你就不会喜欢这场音乐会。

en: If I lost my key, I wouldn't be able to lock the door.
zh: 如果我丢了钥匙，我就没法锁门了。

en: If an oversight is the reason why you have not paid, please send us the amount due, and let us solve the problem immediately.
zh: 如果因为疏忽导致您没有付款，请将应付款项寄给我们，让我们立即解决问题。

en: It will go hard with him if he is found out.
zh: 如果他被发现了，他会倒大霉的。

en: If the demolition of buildings is uncontrolled, a fine city is in danger of becoming nothing more than a concrete jungle.
zh: 如果建筑物拆除不受控制，一个美好的城市就有可能变成一片钢筋水泥的丛林。

en: If I were in good health, I could pursue my studies.
zh: 如果我身体健康，我就可以继续我的学业。

en: If I were healthy, I could go on a hike.
zh: 如果我身体健康，我就可以去徒步旅行。

en: If I had known about the plan, I could have helped him.
zh: 如果我早知道这个计划，我就能帮他了。

en: If I were in your place, I wouldn't do such a thing.
zh: 如果我处在你的位置，我不会做这样的事。

en: But for his advice, I could not finish it.
zh: 要不是他的建议，我就无法完成它。

en: But for your help, he would have failed.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，他早就失败了。

en: If it had not been for your help, my father would have failed.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我父亲早就失败了。

en: If it had not been for your help, I couldn't have completed the work.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我就无法完成这项工作。

en: If it were not for your help, I could not succeed.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我就无法成功。

en: With your help, I could succeed.
zh: 有了你的帮助，我就能成功。

en: If she knew your address, she would write to you.
zh: 如果她知道你的地址，她会给你写信的。

en: If it were not for your help, I could not run this store.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我就无法经营这家店。

en: To look at him, you'd take him for a girl.
zh: 看他的样子，你会把他当成一个女孩。

en: You must work hard if you are to succeed.
zh: 如果你想成功，你必须努力工作。

en: If you are to realize your dream, you must work harder.
zh: 如果你想实现你的梦想，你必须更加努力。
